yaak.model.event
Class SimActionEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      yaak.model.event.ActionEvent
          yaak.model.event.SimActionEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SimActionEvent
extends ActionEvent

SimActionEvent provides infomation for objects that register for SimActionListener-related simulation-aplication operations.

Version:
